title: Monet at the Art Institute of Chicago Postcard Book
description: These postcards celebrate some of the The Art Institute of Chicago's most treasured works:  its impressive collection of paintings and drawings by the French Impressionist artist Claude Monet. This selection of 31 postcards includes stunning scenes of the cliffs of the Normandy coast, the banks of the Seine river, and London's bridges, alongside iconic works from the Stacks of Wheat and Water Lilies series.
